mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (rno, bno, replytext, userid) VALUES (reply_seq.nextval(), #{bno}, #{replytext}, #{userid})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum as rn, A.* FROM ( SELECT rno, bno, replytext, u.userid, r.regdate, r.updatedate, (SELECT userid FROM board WHERE bno = r.bno) as writer FROM reply r, users u WHERE r.userid=u.userid and bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rno desc ) A )
